column1: length ball, angling across the left hander. Punched to cover

clipped off stump! Fast and accurate from the teenager. Length ball on off, and he goes for a backfoot swipe towards midwicket. Beaten for pace, and the ball hits the top of off stump. Sharjeel goes without disturbing the scorers
good length ball, just outside off and he goes for an expansive cover drive. Misses the shot altogether
back of a length, on off, and he rides the bounce to defend off the back foot
full, on middle, and clipped to the gap near midwicket
good length ball, outside off stump, and he rides the bounce to block
good length ball angling in, and he shovels this through midwicket to the fielder in the deep
length ball, cramping him for space, and knocked down to mid on
back of a length, outside off, and tapped to point for a quick single
full, on middle, and he drives straight to mid on. But Kings are committed to the single
back of a length, outside off, and tapped with soft hands into the gap near third man
full on middle, and clipped off his pads to deep midwicket. They settle for the single
full, on middle, and he times a drive beautifully. Finds mid on though
length ball, outside off, a bit too close to his body for the cut. Beaten for pace
good length, on middle, and tapped off his pads to midwicket
good length, angling in, and guided to third man for a single
taps this towards the off side for a quick single. Fiery bowling from Naseem
puts it away! Good length ball, outside off, and the cut finds the gap between cover and point!
full on off, and he goes for the sweep. Misses, and the ball rolls away to third man. Lbw appeal was loud, but the ball was probably missing leg stump
good length, outside off, and cut to point. They scamper across for one after the misfield
full, outside off, and he comes down the ground to drive. Finds cover
finds cow corner! Good length, on middle, but he rocks deep inside his crease before swiping across his pads to find the midwicket boundary
quick single taken, nearly a run out but he's safe at the keeper's end
back of a length, on off, but he pulls this rather uncomfortably, and finds the gap to the right of mid on
good length, on middle, and the attempted pull is missed. Hits his body before lobbing away towards short fine leg
good length on middle, and pushed to mid on
good length on off, and he punches this straight past the bowler. But mid on scampers to his left to intercept what was definitely a boundary shot
removes the big hitter! Full, on middle, and he looks to go up and over. Toe-ends the shot, and comfortably caught by midwicket
good length on middle, and fended towards point
good length ball angling in, and swiped off his pads, past short fine leg
good length, outside off. Cut square, finds point
full, on middle. Looks to nudge it leg side but leading edge takes it to point
first boundary! Short, wide, and he stands tall before cutting past the diving point fielder
good length, on middle. Punched to cover
good length, on off, and tapped to mid on
full, on middle, and driven with the turn to wide long off
good length, on middle. Turning into him, and defended
full, on leg stump. Turning across him and defended
good length, outside off. Cut with the turn to deep point
shortens the length slighty, on off stump. Looks to defend, but takes the top of his pad instead
full, on middle, and slapped past Shahzad at cover
full, on middle, and flicked off his toes to wide long on
good length, outside off, and he cuts this behind square, beating short third man for four!
full, outside off. Big stride forward to defend
full on middle, and the attempted flick is gloved to the leg side
full on off, and flicked to wide long on
good length, from over the wicket. He gets behind the line of the ball and punches to mid off
full, on middle, and driven to mid off
good length, on middle, and turning away. Tries to pull but misses
good length, on off, and guided to point
full, just outside off, and tapped to the off side
good length on off, and turning in. Mistimes the pull to square leg
good length on middle. Tapped off the back foot to long on
good length, on middle, turning across his pads to the leg side
good length, on middle, and turning across the leg side again. Sarfaraz thinks that's a harsh call
good length, on off. Comes down the wicket to punch to mid off
full, outside off, and he mistimes a drive to long off
good length, and he backs away to ut. Can't beat Khan at cover
good length, outside off. Cut square to deep point
good length, outside off. Comfortably cut to point
good length, on off, and flat-batted to long off
banged in short on off from round the stumps, Hasnain immediately has Delport hopping. Jabbed towards point as Delport scampers across to the other end
back of a length and attached with width outside off, chopped to deep third man
back of a length on off, 142.3ks, Delport stays leg-side of the ball and stabs to backward point
much fuller and outside off, Babar stays leg-side of the ball now and carves it away behind point, and to the right of deep third man, for four
wide yorker, 147ks, squeezes under Azam's bat
back of a length and angling into middle, Azam shuffles across off and nurdles the ball through the leg side
wrong'un, fizzes in, Azam uses his feet and cops it on his front pad
shorter legbreak, cut off the back foot wide of point, Watson pulls off a smart diving stop
picked off the pads through midwicket for one
swept from the stumps to deep square leg. Azam comes back for the second

Fawad gives this ample air, lands on off stump, Azam steps out and does not get hold of the loft. Instead, he slices a catch straight to long-off. You can't really force the pace on this pitch even if you're the No.1 T20I batsman
dropped short and wide outside off, cracked off the back foot wide enough of sweeper for a double
full and tailing into the pads, Walton ekes out an inside edge to midwicket
short on middle, backs away and stabs through the cover-point region
back of a length on middle, solidly punched to mid-off hanging back
Delport stays leg-side of another short ball outside off and smears it to the off-side sweeper
mighty full on off, Walton hits it only as far as midwicket
fuller and wider, clattered to sweeper cover once again
tossed on middle, and this is eased down to long-on
tossed up and breaks away outside off, Delport fetches this wrong'un and slog-sweeps it, just about clears the leaping long-on fielder. First six of the innings
flatter and fired on leg stump, quietly defended to the off side
here comes Delport: down the track and biffs it over the long-on fielder again. Pinged off the middle of the bat
speared on middle, played back to the bowler
darted into the pads, diverted only as far as short fine leg. Nonetheless, productive over for Karachi
back of a length and outside off, punched up to sweeper cover. Walton middling the ball straight to the outfielders
overpitched and outside off, Delport stays leg-side of the ball and crunnnnnnches it through cover. In the slot and slotted away
Hasnain drags his length back on middle, Delport swivels on the back foot and drags a pull for one
with fine leg up in the circle, you can't err on the pads. Walton picks it up and simply tickles it away on its way
Hasnain hits a hard length just a shade outside off, flat-batted down the ground for one
full and wide, Delport is happy to stay leg-side of ball and throw his hands at it. This is sliced away behind point and to deep third man's right. 28 off the last two overs
nice and full on middle, Walton likes it there. He extends his hands and launches it over Sohail's head. Bam!
slower bouncer on off, flapped in the air. Naseem Shah runs in from long leg, dives forward, but the ball pops out of his hands. Dropped, but a fairly tough chance, it must be said
another slower variation, Delport glances a single behind square on the leg side
legcutter outside off, stabbed through the covers. Another slower variation from Sohail
back of a length and outside off, another slower ball, hauled away between deep midwicket and wide long-on
slower ball outside off, slashes an outside edge to short third man
full-toss on off, mid-off is up in the circle, and that's thrashed straight of that fielder for four. Delport and Walton are changing the game for Karachi
mid-off has now been sent back, and that's punched to that fielder in the deep
Waton jumps across off and misses a scoop as Naseem takes pace off it and beats the batsman
off-side wide, re-set the radar, Naseem. Good stop from a diving Sarfaraz
pitched up and wide of off, carved to deep third man
wide yorker, just inside the tramline, not called a wide
another wide yorker, Delport reaches out but can't touch it. Excellent finish from Naseem
slower ball outside off, sliced to long-off
Delport ventures down the track, drags a short ball from outside off and pulls over midwicket for his first half-century of the season
full-toss on middle, clubbed straight over the bowler's head for four
whoa, that's a stunning shot from Delport. Pretty full and straight, back-of-the-hand slower variation, Delport reverse-swats it away past point for four. He looks unstoppable now
slower ball, short and wide, crashed to sweeper cover off the back foot
full and wide, just inside the tramline, left alone
banged in short and angling away outside off, Delport is rushed for pace and bottom-edges it just past the stumps
pitched up and outside off, slotted into the covers, as Naseem doesn't get his yorker right
short on the stumps, Walton ventures so very deep in the crease and clunks it over square leg. Pulled hard
full and wide outside off, swings away late, Walton has an even bigger swing at it...and misses
yorker on off, angled down to deep third man
legcutter, but comes out as a full-toss, lofted straight into the lap of long-on. Hasnain and Naseem combine for that key wicket. Fine hand from Walton, nevertheless
swing and a miss outside off
Delport backs away and cracks it down to long-off. He hares back for the second
Delport jumps across off, exposes all three stumps, misses the scoop. The fast man hits the leg stump. Delport falls for 62
full and outside off, slapped back, the force of the shot means the ball bursts through the hands of Hasnain
slower offcutter, hits the thigh and rolls behind wide of the keeper
another slower cutter, off the thigh pad for another leg bye
back of a length and outside off, poked towards short midwicket via an inside edge
pitched further up and slanting away outside off, sucks Shehzad into an away-from-the-body drive. Nicked off to the keeper
back of a length and outside off, stabbed into the covers
chopped behind point to the right of deep third man
full and nipping back in against the angle, inside-edged behind to the keeper
back of a length and angling away outside off, Watson leans back and crisply punches the ball to point
tapped into the covers
short,wide, Manzoor latches onto the width and slashes it through the off-side gap for four. Firmly cut away
bumper outside off, 144ks, Manzoor swipes and misses
back of a length and angling into off stump, Manzoor picks it up the length quickly and swats it flat and hard over midwicket
slower ball, short and wide, creamed away to the point fence
very full at the legs, whipped away fine enough of the man at long leg for four
pitched up and outside off, Watson plants his front leg and punches a drive over the ducking non-striker. Fetch that...
chopped from off stump to third man
Manzoor swishes and misses at a slower ball outside off after using his feet
back of a length and darting back into the thigh pad, having beaten the inside edge
shortish and angling across off, glided down to deep third man
slower ball, short, wide, cut straight to point off the back foot
pushed through shortish and outside off, slog-swept to midwicket
shorter and wider of off, Manzoor skips back and flays it through the covers for four
flighted on off stump, Manzoor drops down to one knee and slog-sweeps it away to the left of deep square leg for four
shorter and spins away outside off, toe-ended to point
pushed through on off, some extra bounce for Umer, draws a top-edged slog-sweep. It sails over short fine leg for four
fuller on middle and leg, knocked into the leg side for a single
back of a length on off stump, pulled away to the left of deep square leg once again
Manzoor runs down the track, but this short ball gets too big on the advancing batsman. Spliced in the air, but doesn't carry to mid-off or short cover
shortish and angling into a leg-side push to the right of short midwicket
shortish on off, flaps a pull to short midwicket
on a length and outside off, Manzoor jumps across off stump and laps it away over short fine leg. Manzoor is showing his range in Karachi
back of a length on off, tip and run to the covers
back of a length and angling into the hips, turned away to deep square leg
back of a length and shoved down the leg side, away from the reach of Watson's flick
sprayed into the pads, tickled away through square leg. Ali Khan is looking to shake off the rest
short and into the body, helped away to long leg. Manzoor rides the bounce well and tosses the strike back to Watson
short and flies through to the keeper. Watson backs away and lets it go in the end
fuller and outside off, Watson stretches out and lifts the ball over mid-off for four. Fifty up for Quetta inside the Powerplay
short on middle stump, Watson jumps back and launches a pull over midwicket. Clears the outfielder. Mighty blow to close out the Powerplay
lobs a full-toss on middle, hacked to deep square leg
skids on outside off, punched off the back foot to extra-cover
flighted and breaks away outside off, driven with the break to sweeper cover off the front foot
dragged down on leg stump, slog-pulled away to deep square leg
flat on middle and leg, swept along the ground to deep square leg
slower through the air but straying down the leg side, helped away past short fine leg for four
fired on off, Manzoor stretches out and sweeps flat and hard to deep square leg
shorter and spins away outside off, Watson goes on the back foot and slugs it over extra-cover
pushed through on off, tip and run to the covers. Watson - creaky legs and all - somehow makes it to the other end
slog-swept to the right of deep square leg. Good work in the outfield from Sharjeel Khan
back of a length on off, punched off the back foot in the gap at the covers
full on middle and leg, played back to the right of the bowler
banged in short and outside off, Watson middles a pull, sending the ball over wide long-on for six
another short ball, another pull, this is a one-bounce four. Cracked over square leg
banged in short on middle, flapped over midwicket
short on off, turned to the leg side
full on the stumps, pumped straight of long-on for a six. Clears his front leg and powers it away like a boss
dug in short and outside off, Watson pummels a pull to the midwicket boundary. He still has it
skids away outside off, chopped off the back foot to point
tossed outside off, Manzoor stretches out and slogs it away over midwicket for six. He hits a fifty in his first match of the season
dragged short and turns away outside off, lashed through the covers
drilled through the line to long-off, and Watson raises a half-century of his own
straighter one on off, Manzoor deploys a big stride and pushes the ball down to long-off
dropped at deep midwicket. Watson goes down on one knee, slog-sweeps in the air, and gets away
good length, wide outside off. Flatbatted to long off
swept! Down on one knee, and drags this sweep from outside off stump
fullish, on middle. Punched to long on
full, on his toes. And driven with the turn to long on
full, on off, and hammered back, but dropped by the bowler! Very difficult...
holes out. Goes for an innovative paddle after shuffling across, but couldnf't generate the power. Taken at short fine leg
almost another one! Back of a length on middle, and he nearly pops this straight back to Maqsood
good length, on middle, and tapped back
back of a length, on middle, and pulled along the ground to deep backward square leg
back of a length, outside leg stump. Clipped to square leg
good length, angling away, and slapped through to deep extra cover
leading edge and easy catch by Walton at cover. Looks to glance it leg side, but leading edge takes it to the off side instead
yorker, down the leg side. Azam skips away from it
back of a length, on middle, and he times a pull beautifully behind square for four
back of a length, on off, and he misses the pull. Through to the keeper

loud appeal for lbw but not given. Keeper wasn't as interested. Length ball outside off but seaming into the right hander. Hits him above the knee roll, in the back leg, and hawkeye says thats too high
good length, on middle, and tucked off his hips to deep backward square leg
full, on middle, and driven to long on
good length, on off. Looks to pull, but toe-ends it to point
short and wide. Watson looks to cut, but misses. Backed away too much
overpitched, outside off, and that's been deposited. Over long off!
good length, outside off, back of a length. Rocks back and pulls to deep midwicket
good length, outside off. Cut square to deep point
spliced to mid off as Watson goes for a big shot again. Stood tall, trying to flat-bat this over the bowler's head, but taken at mid off
on a hattrick! Back of a length, on middle. Tries to guide it leg side, but leading edge gives an easy catch to cover
back of a length, rising delivery. Comfortably defended from near his face
full outside off, and driven off the front foot to wide mid off
good length, on off. Clipped to square leg
full, just outside off, and pushed towards point with the bat's open face
back of a length slower ball. Angling across, and he offers no shot
good length on leg stump. Paddled off his pads to deep midwicket
good length, on middle, and pulled along the ground to deep midwicket
good length, on leg. Tapped leg side
angling across, length ball, and he helps it on its way to third man
oh, shotttt! Overpitched on off, and hammered over the bowler's head! Scores are level
good length, on middle, and flicked to square leg. Dot ball
good length, on middle, and paddled over square leg for four! Gladiators win by five wickets and finish fifth
